Uploader_Guidelines_Text: Please ensure your content follows our community guidelines and policy.
Uploader_AI_Processing_Text: Our AI engine will review your content and automatically generate the best titles and descriptions for each image.
Uploader_Legal_Checkbox: I confirm that I own the rights to these images and that they contain no extreme violence or inappropriate content.
Uploader_Analysis_Complete: Analysis complete. Please re-upload to publish if it was not automatic.
Uploader_Err_Validation: Our validation system is currently unavailable. Please wait a moment and try again.
Uploader_Err_Format: This file format is not supported. Please convert your image to JPG or PNG and try again.
Uploader_Err_Network: We could not connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.
Uploader_Err_Rejected: This image was rejected by our verification system. Please ensure the image is clear and appropriate.
Uploader_Err_Identify: Our AI could not identify the content of this image. Upload canceled.
Uploader_Err_Unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please refresh the page and try again.
Uploader_Err_AI_Config: AI configuration error. Please contact support.
Policy_1_Text1: This website is a community-driven wallpaper platform that allows users to upload and share images (‚Äúwallpapers‚Äù) for public viewing and download.
Policy_1_Text2: The goal of the platform is to provide safe, legal, and high-quality visual content for users worldwide.
Policy_2_Text1: By uploading an image to this platform, you legally confirm and agree that:
Policy_2_List1: You are the original creator of the content, OR
Policy_2_List2: You have all legal rights, licenses, or permissions to upload and distribute the content
Policy_2_Warning1: ‚ö†Ô∏è Ignorance of the law is NOT an excuse.
Policy_2_Warning2: ‚ö†Ô∏è You are 100% responsible for the content you upload.
Policy_3_Text1: The following content is NOT allowed under ANY circumstances:
Policy_3_1_List1: Copyrighted images you do not own
Policy_3_1_List2: Images sourced from: Google Images, Pinterest, Instagram, ArtStation, DeviantArt (unless you are the artist)
Policy_3_1_List3: Movies, TV shows, anime, games (without license)
Policy_3_1_List4: Logos, trademarks, brand assets (Apple, Nike, Google, etc.)
Policy_3_1_List5: AI-generated images trained on copyrighted works without proper rights
Policy_3_1_Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Uploading copyrighted content without permission may result in:
Policy_3_1_Warning_List4: Disclosure of your account data if legally required
Policy_3_2_List4: Extreme violence, gore, or disturbing imagery
Policy_3_2_List5: Hate speech, racism, discrimination, or extremist ideology
Policy_3_2_List7: Content encouraging self-harm, suicide, or dangerous acts
Policy_3_3_Text1: You MUST NOT upload content related to:
Policy_3_3_List1: Drugs, illegal substances, or promotion of drug use
Policy_3_3_List5: Any content illegal under international or local law
Policy_4_Title: 4. AI Content Moderation and Automated Review ü§ñ
Policy_4_Text1: To protect users and the platform:
Policy_4_List1: All uploaded content is automatically analyzed using Google AI and other automated systems
Policy_4_List2: AI systems may analyze: Image content, Metadata, Visual patterns, Copyright indicators
Policy_4_List3: AI systems may reject, flag, delay, or permanently block content
Policy_4_Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è AI decisions are final and may occur without warning.
Policy_4_Text2: The platform reserves the right to:
Policy_4_List4: Reject any content for any reason
Policy_4_List5: Remove approved content at any time
Policy_5_List1: Content may be reviewed manually by moderators
Policy_5_List3: Past approval does NOT guarantee future approval
Policy_5_Text2: The platform owner has full authority to:
Policy_6_1_Text: You retain ownership of your content.
Policy_6_2_Title: 6.2 License You Grant to the Platform
Policy_6_2_Text1: By uploading content, you grant the platform a license that is:
Policy_6_2_Text2: This allows us to host, display, cache, resize, optimize, distribute, and promote your content.
Policy_6_2_Text3: This license remains valid even if your account is deleted, unless the content is fully removed.
Policy_7_Text2: Copyright holders may submit DMCA or equivalent takedown requests.
Policy_7_List5: Repeated violations lead to permanent bans
Policy_8_List4: Share data with legal authorities when required
Policy_8_Warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Creating multiple accounts to bypass bans is prohibited.
Policy_9_List2: Content may be copied or downloaded by third parties
Policy_9_List3: The platform is not responsible for misuse by others
Policy_9_Text2: Use the platform at your own risk.
Policy_10_Text1: The platform owner is NOT responsible for:
Policy_10_Text2: All liability lies with the uploader.
Policy_11_Text2: Failure to comply may result in:
Policy_12_Text1: These rules may be updated at any time without notice.
Policy_12_Text2: Continued use of the platform means you accept all changes.
Policy_13_Text1: If you upload illegal, copyrighted, or inappropriate content:
Policy_13_List2: Your account may be permanently banned
Policy_14_Text: For legal concerns, copyright claims, or policy questions:
Generator_Subtitle: Create unique images from text descriptions using Vertex AI.
Generator_Prompt_Placeholder: A cinematic shot of a futuristic city at sunset, cyberpunk style, neon lights...
Generator_Status_Generating: Generating image... this may take a moment.
ERR_AUTH_REQUIRED: You need to be logged in to do that. Please sign up or log in.
ERR_FILENAME_REQUIRED: A filename is required for this operation.
ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND: The requested file could not be found. It may have been moved or deleted.
ERR_HIGH_TRAFFIC_WARNING: High server traffic detected. Processing may take a little longer than usual.
ERR_UPLOAD_NO_FILE_PART: No file was included in the request. Please select a file.
ERR_UPLOAD_NO_SELECTED_FILE: You did not select a file to upload.
ERR_UPLOAD_FILE_TYPE_NOT_ALLOWED: This file type is not allowed. Please use JPG, PNG, or WEBP.
ERR_SERVER_BUSY: The server is currently busy processing other images. Please try again in a moment.
ERR_IMAGE_PROCESSING_FAILED: The server failed to process the image. It might be corrupted or in an unsupported format.
ERR_FILE_SAVE_FAILED: An error occurred while trying to save the file on the server.
ERR_INVALID_CATEGORY: The selected category is not valid.
ERR_PUBLISH_NO_FILES: No files were provided to publish.
ERR_PUBLISH_FAILED: Failed to publish one or more files. Please check the details and try again.
ERR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
ERR_MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELDS: Please fill out all required fields.
ERR_USER_CREATED: Account created successfully! Please log in.
ERR_EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED: This email address is already registered with an account.
ERR_USER_CREATION_FAILED: An unexpected error occurred while creating your account.
ERR_AUTH_ERROR: An authentication error occurred. Please try logging in again.
ERR_NETWORK_ERROR: Could not connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
ERR_GENERATOR_NOT_INITIALIZED: The AI image generator is not available at the moment. Please try again later.
ERR_PROMPT_BLOCKED_SAFETY: Your request was blocked by our safety filters. Please try a different prompt.
ERR_GENERATOR_INVALID_ARGUMENT: There was an issue with the request sent to the AI generator. Please try rephrasing your prompt.
ERR_GENERATOR_UNEXPECTED_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred with the AI image generator. We have been notified.
ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND_IN_STORAGE: The file could not be found in the processing queue. It may have expired.
ERR_UNEXPECTED_ANALYSIS_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred during image analysis.
ERR_UNKNOWN_ANALYSIS_ERROR: An unknown error occurred during image analysis.
ERR_UNEXPECTED_GENERATION_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred during image generation.
ERR_UNKNOWN_GENERATION_ERROR: An unknown error occurred during image generation.
ERR_WORKER_CRASH: A server process encountered an issue. Your request will be retried automatically.
ERR_SECURITY_ALERT_BASE: Upload blocked. The image was flagged for: {reason}.
